title: New: Patterns In Plastic – Balloons Don’t Always Fly (Remixes)
content: As if I needed any further proof that sometimes the best things can be right underneath your nose, Newcastle’s Patterns In Plastic exploded onto my radar with their excellent Balloons Don’t Always Fly EP, three tracks of trippy, experimental EDM, quite unlike anything else coming from the North East at this present moment. Not only that, but the duo comprised of Wesley Akinfolarin and Joe William Todd also brought in some of their (and as it happens also my) favourite producers to try their hand at reworking the EP cuts. Featuring the likes of Sina., Module Module and Sun Glitters, each remix is wonderfully crafted, with the respective artists stamping their own authority on the tracks. Check out the full release below (Sina’s reworking of Sleepyhead is my personal favourite).
